title: How to Make Gold Cake

steps.headline: Beat the butter and sugar to a cream.
Whip the yolks of the eggs.
Stir in the flour and the baking powder.
Butter or use nonstick spray on the pans and bake in a moderate oven for one hour.

text: Obtain the ingredients listed.  Beat the butter and sugar to a cream.  Whip the yolks of the eggs.  Stir in the eggs.  Sift the flour.  Stir in the flour and the baking powder.  Flavor with lemon.  Butter or use nonstick spray on the pans and bake in a moderate oven for one hour.
sentences: Beat the butter and sugar to a cream.
Whip the yolks of the eggs.
Stir in the flour and the baking powder.
Butter or use nonstick spray on the pans and bake in a moderate oven for one hour.
